pages.text: Much like other parasites, Vagrants can adapt to certain damage sources. If the source is a human, they will adapt to their held weapon, otherwise they will adapt to the source itself.

Vagrants can record notably less damage types than most other parasites, but in exchange they appear to be more willing to configure said adaptations at will.$(br)$(#630000)I can do this in the Malleability Menu, opened with $(k:srpcotesia.mallmenu).
$(#630000)Adaptations are listed on the right, and each one can be inspected by hovering over the red X, which will show the damage reduction. I can forget a damage type by clicking on that X button.
$(#630000)Additionally, I should be able to put a piece of Living or Sentient armor into a special slot, allowing me to configure its adaptations as well.
$(#630000)With an active Colony, I can also request its current stored damage type and corresponding resistance, provided it has one. This should also work for any armor I configure.
